casebody.data:
Cleveland
v.
Bur. of Workers' Comp. 2018-0572 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 5, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Cause accepted and held for the decision in 2017-0179, Cirino v. Bur. Of Worker's Comp., and briefing schedule stayed. O'Connor, C.J., would accept the cause on proposition of law No. I only.

Kennedy, J., would not hold the cause or stay the briefing schedule.
